title: LET ME USE MY MONEY ON YOUR GAME!! PLIIIIIIIIIIIIIS
body:
Failed to load URL "https://plstore.euw1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/" with error "unknown error code -118" (-118).

;________________;

Is there any way of getting some type of answer, or at least let us know with using the Service status :(

---*Update*---
 Service status has been changed, and they are working on solving the issue. Thanks Riot! 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} 

-----------------------FIXED!------------------------------

replies.body:
Hey guys, thanks for the heads up!  Based on the reports here, it sounds like some EUW and EUNE players are failing to purchase RP.  I'll try to get some more info to see what's going on, and offer updates as I get them.  Hang tight!

**To update**, proper teams have been notified and it's being investigated.
Big deal is a i cant buy yasuo at off sale and tommorow this will be gone

You don't have to worry about that, it will be fixed within the day, and if it's not I am 100% sure RIOT will help you with your purchase. I'm just happy we got an answer.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Can RIOT repair this faster?
We want to buy some champions like Ekko {{champion:245}} or Yasuo {{champion:157}} and skins.
uff, same to me, I'm not alone
Yeah, I think they've had some problems with that recently and I really need to get some RPs today because it's my friend's birthday. I hope it gets solved soon.
Yeah same! My girlfriends birthday is  today, and I want to give her some skins together with my other gifts! Feelsbadman. Riot please help us, we are in dire need of your assistance!
So... any news? :| Really want to purchase some rp {{champion:32}}
